info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Transylvania, southeastern Jackson, southern Haywood, northwestern Pickens and north central Oconee Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southeast of Sylva, or 8 miles northwest of Lake Toxaway, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rosman, Lake Toxaway, Gorges State Park, Cashiers, B.R. Parkway-Black Balsam To Mount Pisgah, B.R. Parkway-Balsam Gap To Black Balsam Area, Black Balsam Area, Lake Jocassee, Jocassee Gorges and Tuckasegee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
